Entries.default: "You have proven your cunning, Watcher, and we deem you worthy to compete for my blessing. Seek the Pool of Memories when you are rested and ready to continue your hunt."
"Few creatures kill with the cold intentionality of the spider. Fewer still can resist the Seeker's children when they work in tandem."
"It is not enough to find the flaw in your enemy, one must also know how to unweave their advantages. Excellent hunt, Watcher."
"Seek the proper unraveling of the brood, lest you be overrun by mother and hatchlings."
"Our contenders will now face an enemy defined by its formlessness, all but immune to unfocused aggression."
"Even a formless enemy has weaknesses. Seek the frailty in your prey, and victory will never escape your grasp."
"Seek the weakest link among the prey, for your foes will not be as flimsy as their appearances suggest."
"Though they lack the spider's patience, lagufaeth share the Seeker's need to hunt ever. To prowl ever. To stalk and shadow."
"Exploit their weakness, lest your flesh feed these ravenous scavengers."
"The fury of the lagufaeth brood has found its rival. Well done, Toamowhai is pleased."
"Akumeno Waidyo was a mighty druid in his time, and his brother Masumeno Waidyo a wizard of no small renown."
"Believing themselves safe from one another, their sparring matches would ultimately destroy them."
"The steel one wears into battle is less important than the opportunities found amid the battlefield. In the advantages of your setting, you can find victory."
"The tomb of Vathor Cadhu carries more remains of seekers than it does remains of the Cadhu family. Though the tomb is now buried beneath the dunes, the memory of an attempted raid survives."
"Step lightly and be on your guard, for Vathor Cadhu assumed his wealth would be robbed by future kith - and planned accordingly."
"The patient hunter is often the best fed. Where others found a hasty demise, you find victory. Well done."
"You have proven your cunning, Watcher, and we deem you worthy to compete for my blessing. Seek the Pool of Memories when you are rested and ready to continue your hunt."
"Though lumbering and erratic, the ooze is a creature well-adapted to its environment."
"Though your foe claimed a fortified position, you emerge victorious."
"Are you equally adaptable? Or will you fail here?"
"Not satisfied with mastery of his own art, each developed powerful wards against his brother's craft."
"It is not enough to find the flaw in your enemy, one must also know how to unweave their advantages. Excellent hunt, Watcher."
"Even a formless enemy has weaknesses. Seek the frailty in your prey, and victory will never escape your grasp."
"The fury of the lagufaeth brood has found its rival. Well done, Toamowhai is pleased."
"The steel one wears into battle is less important than the opportunities found amid the battlefield. In the advantages of your setting, you can find victory."
"The patient hunter is often the best fed. Where others found a hasty demise, you find victory. Well done."
"Though your foe claimed a fortified position, you emerge victorious."
